dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Intruder, you dare to approach the sanctum of the Ancient Sphinx Guardian. What foolishness drives you here?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek passage through this realm, mighty Guardian.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Passage? You must prove yourself worthy to tread these sands. Will you face the trial, or flee like a coward?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will face the trial with courage and honor.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Courage is a rare sight among mortals. Proceed, but be warned, failure holds dire consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I shall tread carefully and respect the trials. I am ready.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect carries you far. The sands will reveal your fate now. Prepare yourself for the judgment.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I feel unease. I choose to depart without taking the trial.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fleeing proves your unworthiness. Leave before my wrath finds you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense danger in this trial. I will retreat for now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Retreat, then, and be branded a coward in the eyes of the desert. The sands will remember your weakness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see no need to prove my worth. I will take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Arrogance blinds you. You will not leave unscathed. The desert hunger for your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking knowledge and understanding, O Guardian of the Sands.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is a prize earned, not freely given. What will you offer in return for the secrets you seek?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer my respect and an exchange of wisdom, noble Guardian.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect and wisdom hold value. Speak, then, and listen in turn. The desert whispers truths and lies alike.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am open to the whispers of the desert. Share with me its mysteries.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The mysteries are deep, and the sands unforgiving. Listen closely, for not all who seek knowledge find solace.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not interested in sharing knowledge. I will depart in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your disinterest is noted. Leave in peace while the sands watch your path.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer nothing but my curiosity. Will you indulge me, Guardian?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curiosity may lead to discovery or demise. Choose your questions wisely, for the answers hold weight.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will listen to your tales and learn from the history of this place.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: History weaves the tapestry of fate. Listen well, for the threads of destiny intertwine around you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have lost interest. Farewell, Guardian of the Sands.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Interest lost is curiosity wasted. Depart, for the sands have no tolerance for idle minds.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge the authority of the Ancient Sphinx Guardian. Prepare for a confrontation.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a mere traveler. A challenge accepted brings consequences unforeseen. Do you understand the risk?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear no consequences. En garde, Guardian!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fearlessness often masks ignorance. Experience now the consequences of your reckless challenge.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I reconsider my challenge. Let us part ways without conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Reconsideration shows wisdom glimpsed. Part ways now before the sands thirst for bloodshed.
